# Lantern Light (Spell)
## Overview
[[Evocation Spells|Evocation]] \[[[Good Spells|good]], [[Light Spells|light]]]

**Level:** [[1st Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 1]], [[1st Level Paladin Spells|Paladin 1]], [[1st Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 1]], Vassal of Bahamut 1, [[1st Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 1]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 2nd-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 2]], [[BoXM 2nd-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 2]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** S, Abstinence

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Effect:** Ray

**Duration:** 1 round/level

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Book of Exalted Deeds (WotC), pg. 101

Rays of holy light flash from your eyes. You can fire 1 ray per 2 caster levels, but no more than 1 ray per round. You must succeed on a ranged touch attack to hit a target. The target takes 1d6 points of damage from each ray.

*Abstinence Component:* You must abstain from sexual intercourse for 24 hours before casting this spell.
